name: Space Attack (Fun2Play Games)
description:
Thank you for checking out Space Attack!

Tutorial:

- Use A and D to rotate your ship

- Press Space to shoot

- Select different bullets using the numbers 1-5

- You can open the shop by pressing P

Things to remember:

- Any bullets that are not 'Normal' will cost 50 coins to fire

- There are 3 different types of enemies: Normal, Healing and Tank

Info about each bullet:

(The number in the list corresponds to the number to press to select it during gameplay)

1. Normal - Deals 1 damage.

2. Shotgun - Deals anywhere from 10 to 0 damage, the size and damage are proportional to each other. Very short range but high damage! Also fires at a slightly random angle (bullet spread).

3. Shrapnel - These bullets act like the Normal bullets. However, when they hit an enemy, the bullet splits up, allowing you to hit and even kill multiple enemies with one shot.

4. Fire - These bullets act like the Normal bullets. However, when they hit an enemy, it will set them on fire and continuously deal small amounts of damage to the enemy.

5. Freeze - These bullets act like the Normal bullets. However, when they hit an enemy, the enemy will move at a drastically slower pace, allowing for more time to kill the enemy before they reach you.

Info about each enemy:

Note: All enemies will give you a random amount of coins between 5 and 20.

- Normal: Has 1 health. Will deal 10% damage to the player.

- Healing: Has 2 health. When killed will give you 10% health back and have a chance to restore you to 100%.

- Tank: This enemy will move slowly. It has a base health of 2 and an extra 0.5 health for every wave. For example, on wave 32 it would have a health of 2 + 32 * 0.5 = 18

Info about the shop:

There are currently 2 products available in the shop:

1. Cooldown Time - By purchasing this upgrade, your cooldown time will decrease, allowing you to fire bullets more often. This upgrade has a max level of 20.

2. Medkit - By purchasing this, you will be restored to 100% health. You can buy an unlimited amount.

I hope you enjoy this fun little game!

If you find any bugs or need any help with anything, feel free to ask at support@fun2playgames.com
